configuration:
hbase.rpc.engine org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc.SecureRpcEngine
hbase.cluster.distributed true
hbase.rootdir hdfs://localhost:9000/hbase
//Here you have to set the path where you want HBase to store its built in zookeeper files.
hbase.zookeeper.property.dataDir /usr/local/zookeeper
hbase.bulkload.staging.dir /apps/hbase/staging Directory in the default filesystem, owned by the hbase user, and has permissions(-rwx--x--x, 711)
hbase.security.auth.enable true
hbase.security.authentication kerberos
hbase.security.authorization true
hbase.coprocessor.master.classes
hbase.coprocessor.region.classes org.apache.hadoop.hbase.security.token.TokenProvider A comma-separated list of Coprocessors that are loaded by default on all tables.
hbase.coprocessor.regionserver.classes
hbase.regionserver.kerberos.principal hbase/_HOST@EXAMPLE.COM
hbase.regionserver.keytab.file /var/keytabs/hbase.keytab
hbase.master.kerberos.principal hbase/_HOST@EXAMPLE.COM
hbase.master.keytab.file /var/keytabs/hbase.keytab
hbase.rest.authentication.type kerberos
hbase.rest.authentication.kerberos.principal HTTP/_HOST@EXAMPLE.COM
hbase.rest.authentication.kerberos.keytab /var/keytabs/HTTP.keytab
hbase.rest.keytab.principal hbase/_HOST@EXAMPLE.COM
hbase.rest.keytab.file /var/keytabs/hbase.keytab
hbase.security.authentication.ui kerberos
hbase.security.authentication.spnego.kerberos.principal HTTP/_HOST@EXAMPLE.COM
hbase.security.authentication.spnego.kerberos.keytab /var/keytabs/HTTP.keytab
hbase.thrift.security.qop auth
hbase.thrift.kerberos.principal hbase/_HOST@EXAMPLE.COM
hbase.thrift.kerberos.file /var/keytabs/hbase.keytab
hbase.rest.kerberos.principal hbase/_HOST@EXAMPLE.COM
hbase.rest.kerberos.file /var/keytabs/hbase.keytab
hadoop.proxyuser.HTTP.groups *
hadoop.proxyuser.HTTP.hosts *
hbase.thrift.keytab.file /var/keytabs/hbase.keytab
hbase.thrift.kerberos.principal hbase/_HOST@EXAMPLE.COM
hbase.thrift.security.qop auth
hbase.regionserver.thrift.http true
hbase.thrift.support.proxyuser true
hbase.regionserver.info.port 16030
hbase.regionserver.port 16020
hbase.master.port 16000
hbase.master.info.port 16010
hbase.rest.port 8021
dfs.support.append true
hbase.superuser hbase
hbase.tmp.dir /var/log/hadoop-hbase
zookeeper.znode.parent /hbase
hbase.zookeeper.property.kerberos.removeHostFromPrincipal true
hbase.zookeeper.property.kerberos.removeRealmFromPrincipal true
hbase.zookeeper.property.admin.serverPort 8020
hbase.zookeeper.property.clientPort 2181 The port at which the clients will connect.
hbase.zookeeper.property.authProvider.1 org.apache.zookeeper.server.auth.SASLAuthenticationProvider
hbase.zookeeper.property.dataDir /usr/local/zookeeper/ Property from ZooKeeper's config zoo.cfg. The directory where the snapshot is stored.
hbase.zookeeper.property.dataLogDir /var/log/hadoop-zookeeper Property from ZooKeeper's config zoo.cfg. The directory where the snapshot is stored.
hbase.rpc.protection authentication
hbase.superuser hbase
security.admin.protocol.acl *
security.client.protocol.acl *
security.masterregion.protocol.acl *
